attributes.action: Refuse to discuss with the Spanish government on the sovereignty of Gibraltar
attributes.additional_details: It would be hypocritical of Spain to claim any sovereignty over Gibraltar whilst they retain sovereignty over their enclaves of Melilla and Ceuta in Morocco on the African continent
attributes.background: Gibraltar has been part of the UK since the Treaty of Utrecht 1713 and whilst geographically attached to the Iberian peninsula, this is not cause alone for Spain to claim jurisdiction over it
